name: ClearTech Ventures, LLC
tag_list: defense, security, energy, outdoor, prototype, emerging, disruptive, optics, battery, laser, power, weapon, clean, alternative, communications, software
overview:
ClearTech Ventures, LLC invests in disruptive emerging technologies across the defense, security, energy and advanced outdoors markets, with particular focus on dual-use technologies transferable across sectors.

ClearTech has particular interest in electro-optics, sensors, weaponry, clean/alternative energy, lightweight power sources, and communications and software technologies at prototype or later stages (TRL 6).

ClearTech invests seed to early stage, committing up to $25 million of its own capital with no set minimum investment amount.
